name: How to Sell an Agency | Mat Bennett
description:
How to Sell an Agency | Mat Bennett

# How to Sell an Agency

Ever wondered what it takes to build then sell an Agency? Been curious to learn what was behind the sales you’ve read about in press releases? I’ve got some good news for you! How to Sell an Agency is a podcast looking at the reality of building and selling agency businesses. Host Mat Bennett, who sold his own agency in 2021, interviews other agency founders who have built, grown and sold their businesses. Together they uncover lesson
